article_title: Barack Obama: 20 Aides Work On President's Social Media Profiles
article_text:

twitter.description: As the saying goes, it takes a village to raise a child. In this case, it takes about 20 White House aides to manage President Barack Obama’s social media profiles, including Twitter and Face...
twitter.title: President Obama Has 20 Aides Working on His Social Media Presence

article_metadata.description: President Barack Obama has 20 White House aides working on his Twitter and Facebook social media profiles, The New York Times reports.
